name: Erebus
legendaryAbilityText: When you pass, you may exhaust this card to roll 1 die. On a result of 1-4, each player must remove 3 units from the fracture if able, if this removes the last units on a planet, place 2 neutral infantry there and return it to the planet deck. On a result of 5-10, start an Evolution splice with each player in the Fracture participating.
legendaryAbilityFlavourText: The last memory of the universe before.
